reviews.text: By far my all-time favorite dining experience. The staff are very friendly, and the atmosphere is generally very welcoming; whether you come dining here with others or by yourself. The seafood is top quality, happy hour and DJ nights are a good and fun way to have a bit of fun, and some of the more pricey items are worth the price. I'm also glad they're starting to do dessert items, and hopefully they continue to do so, as that was the main thing this place lacked for me. The only negative I have is that I believe the tin of napkins should already be on the table and you shouldn't have to ask for them (considering how messy some food can get). But besides that, you have to come here when you got the time and money. You won't regret it.
Lani   love you the real bomb agree the bomb amazing job

this place was genuinely amazing in all aspects! service, food, and vibes were a 10/10! the portions were slightly bigger than other places. and the prices were very reasonable. loved our server! she was a sweetheart! :)
Amazing service from chayanne w.
Great customer service! Hope to see Chayanne again, she made the experience great
They banned me from the restaurant without any call or any explanation why and it is very unprofessional and very uncomfortable

Chayanne W
She was very polite and AMAZING!!!
Why, because I ask her to help me make this experience for my grandson, as this was his first time here and he is autistic..
SHE WAS MORE THAN AMAZING!!!
She made sure that she made him very comfortable and was answering all the questions he had pertaining the Shirley temple drink and the sauce for the snow crab seasoning‚Ä¶
He was a happy camper at the end of the day‚Ä¶

I had the pleasure of dining at Hook & Reel recently, and our experience was made truly exceptional thanks to our server, Chayanne. From the moment we were seated, she greeted us warmly and made us feel completely welcome. She was attentive without ever being intrusive, anticipating our needs before we even had to ask.

Service like this is rare, and it elevated our entire dining experience. Chayanne went above and beyond, and I would absolutely return to this restaurant knowing that we‚Äôd be in such great hands again. Highly recommend asking for her if you visit‚Äîyou won‚Äôt be disappointed!

I‚Äôve been coming to this hook & reel for the past year since moving into the neighborhood. The service is good and the music is also a plus here. Melani is very sweet and has great customer service.

I came to celebrate my friends birthday. There were about 20 people and only one server. We suggested she have help she said she was good. At the end the bills were all screwed up. Double orders on different bills. Some people had thier order on 2 or 3 bills. Someone got charged for something they didn't get another ordered pasta and she didn't get it another waited a really long time for just a soda way after she got her food. The bills were a hot mess . The birthday girl was very upset and asked for my help to sort it out. It took me an hour or more to sort the mess out.. I had to have her reprint SEVERAL times. I didn't enjoy myself at all mind you I didn't even eat. I feel the server could've been more helpful in sorting things out instead I did it all and I was highly frustrated. Not a good experience for me at all.i feel that for a large group there should be two servers.
Everytime I come to hook&Reel Shawn always takes good care of me. Best place to be.
This is my spot to come to after work so I can unwind. Make sure you catch Shawn the bartender he makes them drinks good.
Shawn great server üíØ
Shawn really is the best !!!!!
Cheyanne

Service was awesome! I came with three kids. My waitress had so much patience, which I appreciate. Customer service was Amazing. If you have kids that love to sing come on Wednesday night karaoke be popping. Definitely a five star
Letrice was AMAZING!!! Superb customer service and great recommendations!
Letrice was great five star service and it was fast . Thanks Letrice
Her service was greatwith a big smile
Lani was awesome. Drinks were great ü•∞
Great service thank you üòä
Lani  was very attentive to her Area, she smiled although she was busy she still communicated with me.
Milani is always gracious and attentive.
I had a great time
Thank You to our server Jay Great service!

Food taste so good
MS Jay was great!!! Very friendly i like people like her
We will be back!!!
Jay had great customer service
Cheyanne was a very good server and she was very nice
Cheyanne
Chayanne
Letriece is soo amazing she was very attentive and made sure that me and my party was comfortable. I come here just to experience her! That food is great but her service is immaculate‚Ä¶

I had such a wonderful experience here BOTH TIMES I‚Äôve visited. From the moment you walk in, the employees are incredibly hospitable, attentive, and kind. Letrice consistently checked in to make sure we had everything we needed and truly went above and beyond to make our visit special.

The food was excellent fresh, flavorful, and perfectly prepared. It‚Äôs rare to find a place where both the service and the food exceed expectations, but they absolutely delivered!

Letrice is an awesome waiter. She is so personable, professional and goes out of her way to make the costumer feel special.
The entire staff is so accommodating and welcomed. I love dining.here.

I  had such an amazing experience at hook & reel! Letrice was our server here for the second time and she has been amazing both times she shows outstanding hospitality! This was definitely worth writing a review for. I really appreciate not only her service, but the entire staff was extremely friendly and hospitable. The food was everything I wanted & expected. Thank you so much for making our first time here a memorable experience and my grandmother‚Äòs 85th birthday special!
AMIR WAS AMAZING GIVE HIM MORE HOURS RIGHT NOW!!! SUCH AN AMAZING BRIGHT PERSON AND ATL
Amir did very well, an amazing host and well mannered gentle man (and good lookin')
Shawn is amazing
Amir was super nice and attentive, will definitely be coming back! :)
Amir is so professional and he‚Äôs very kind. He also is very attentive. Love the service he applied for me and my girls !
Crew is very friendly, is the closest place to my job so it‚Äôs like a second home to unwind and watch the fam.

I kid you not I have never received such terrible service , they always leave you sitting until they feel like coming over to serve you. I learned my lesson too many times in Parkchesters hook and reel. Never again

Chayanne was so pleasant and cheerful.
Look forward to coming back w great service and food.
Our waitress Letrice was amazing! She was super nice, checked on us often, and made sure we had everything we needed. The service really made our meal so much better. Thank you Letrice!
Jay great server miss her behind bar
Jay was great!
Amir, gave us great service tonight! He made sure we were well cared for!
amir, good service, very interactive and attentive
Amir k was the a great server, every charismatic
Amir was kind and helpful and a great server.
I love it here, come here for every occasion and get the same waiter. Letrice 5 star service everytime, and can count of fast and tasty food!

As soon as I walked in our server Letrice was very welcoming and comforting. I enjoyed my time here and the service, music was a plus. She had a great smile and a friendly demeanor. I would definitely come back but only if she is my server. Keep her around !! And possibly pay her double ! Good times , great food

From the moment I sat down, I knew I was in good hands. Lani isn‚Äôt just a bartender‚Äîshes an experience in themselves. The level of skill, creativity, and attention to detail they bring to every drink is unmatched. Each cocktail felt like it was made with care and passion, not just mixed.
Beyond the drinks, her energy and presence made the my happy hour memorable. She was attentive without being overbearing, engaging without forcing conversation, and had a way of making every guest feel welcomed and seen. Amazing Bartender üíØüíØüíØ
Letrice was a great server! Even though she had many other tables she did everything she could to be hospitable and super nice and attentive!
This location was above and beyond. Our server Latrice was definitely employee of the year. She was very attentive and pleasant. We‚Äôll definitely be back.

Updated 7/21/2025, on this day had great time, the service and food and ambience were excellent to my surprise. The staff and owner, Ella, very attentive to their customers. I very rarely give a five but on this day all was excellent. The owner Ella,  was very kind and attentive if we needed anything. Thank you !

Approx., two years ago..Service was good. Female bartenders were very nice and attentive.

UPDATE... Letrice was AMAZING
She was patient and organized. Always checking on us,  never missing a beat! She decorated a plate for my son's  day...nice af. I wish she could have been here in the past. It's okay, she made up for past experiences. Look at the plate in the pic.

Update...3/8 against my advice and review my family decided to try this place, my sis never been here so we gave it a shot. My main issue was the waitress had a cold and snot tissue in her hand. I tried to get a pic, but she tossed it by the time she returned to the table. Then she forgot the drinks and an order, no biggie, but the food she gave us was incorrect. We kept it, even paid for it. She said she had adhd...idk what happened, I thought for sure she would be a vibe.

1/20 Got there @ 9:11 and was passed 2x by an Asian girl and overlooked by the girl  sitting beside the door. The Hispanic male also stood there never acknowledging me. Finally I asked @  9:17 how long do I have to wait to be seated? He gon ask the other girl in the corner, i didn't even see her. She gon look at the time and say 9:15. I said I been in here since 9:11 and you (pointing to the Hispanic dude saw me when I walked in. The other girl sitting by the door ran to help the guy that came through the door, only to see he was with me. Her turn of shame was priceless. The girl from the corner proceeded to show me a sign that the last seating was @ 9:15. I said it's cool, but it was very rude and u professional how this all transpired. If I had not asked y'all would not have said nothing. The girl from the corner offered her apologies, but the damage was done. I called on Saturday and spoke to an Asian man I believe. He was so nice and welcoming, to bad the call didn't match the experience. We would have taken the food to go, but that wasn't even offered. It's cool  google says they have another location on 161st street
The server Chayanne was very pleasant and welcoming. The food was good like "the last supper!"

This location is great! My waitress was awesome. Always smiling and knowledgeable of the menu. She definitely helped me pick a sauce for my boil. I had two cluster of crab legs n half pound shrimp. That sauce was everything! The shrimp was nice n big not all small n skimp üòÜ.
The atmosphere is nice decor gave nautical vibes.
Miss Priscilla was so good because she made me a good order. Jaida was good as well meeting her today

I came to my local Hook n Reel ( 75 Metropolitan Ave) today 9/5/2025 with my family, and our waiter Amir provided excellent service. He was knowledgeable of the menu and made great suggestions. His kindness and etiquette was exemplary, and we will be returning to this location!

On Wednesday 8/27, we had a great experience with Milani and Luz.  They were very nice, attentive and welcoming.  It was a pleasure dining in here today.  The previous people who were here last year were terrible.  Thank you for hiring them ‚ù£Ô∏è

Service could have been better. We were there for lunch, and it was pretty empty. I had to ask more than once for things. Rum punch was like Kool-Aid with 2 caps of bottom grade rum. Carry your own hot sauce (Tabasco) if you want spicy hot for the seafood other than that it good.
Chayanne was fantastic! Regularly stopping by to ensure everything was okay. Definitely five star service!

Wonderful atmosphere. Our waiter Amir was outstanding! Very attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed. The service was quick, professional, and genuinely warm. One of the best dining experiences I‚Äôve had thanks to him

The waitress  Jay  she greeting  us with a smile and waited patiently for my order .Im always undecided  everything looks good.Food can nice and hot. She came to check  if everything was good did I need anything .very  professional  .I like her hope when I come  back Im going to look for her.She made me feel welcome .

Terrible experience! Ac definitely doesn‚Äôt work in there! Should have been a sign and left but nope, wanted to give them a chance. Appetizers were brought out but we didn‚Äôt have any utensils‚Ä¶ had to request them‚Ä¶ when we got our seafood boil no gloves or bibs, had to request that also‚Ä¶ and of course the waitress expected a tip. As a paying guest I felt like such an inconvenience to them for being there
Our server was great!!!! Milani gave us everything we need and more. She was attentive and made sure that we were good throughout our visit! We are definitely coming back again!!!!

Amir was our server and the experience was amazing, he provided a comfortable warm environment was quick with our drinks and food and was overall just so pleasant to have. Would definitely comeback just for the experience of having him as a server again

Amir was our waiter. He was very attentive and explained the menu very well. He recommend certain items on the menu and was always smiling. I would recommend coming here because of his service and the food.

Letrice is the bomb!!! She is the best waitress and we have been here a few times.  She recommended the steamed oysters to me and my 11 year old and it was amazing!!!! Thank you thank you thank you Letrice.   We look forward to dining here again and hoping that we get blessed with Letrice as our waitress!!!

Amazing service my didn‚Äôt not take long to come and I came here with my mother, little sister (9 years old) and myself! We ordered mini boils everything was well served and well seasoned and cooked! I had an amazing time would return again and recommend to others! Loved the experience thanks to Chayanne W she was amazing!
Lani was the sweetest thing!! So friendly, attentive and kind.. very professional. Will definitely keep coming back

The restaurant was well decorated, and food was also good. Being that it is a franchise did not expect such great tasting food for a franchise. The server was great and attentive it was a great experience at this location. Prices were very good as well

Letrice was a awesome server.  She was very accommodating.  Her personality shined making me and my family feel welcomed and comfortable.  I would definitely come back and ask her to be outer server again. She was also ready to dance battle my friend.  Thank you for a great time Letrice.
Love the prices at this place. Happy hour is the best . Our server Chayanne is the goat. She came to us and told jokes. We had a hella good time . Ask for her if she's working . Mad cool vibes .
Letrice was very efficient, respectful, good energy, recommended good drinks. It‚Äôs was my daughter‚Äôs birthday and she brought her a cake. Loved her customer service.

I'd want to thank Letrice for going above and beyond to ensure that our dinner experience was exceptional. Her sincere welcome and excellent service made all the difference.Our server, Letrice was just fantastic.

Letrice was amazing , quick and very professional . She‚Äôs been one of the best waiters I‚Äôve came across . Super charismatic and efficient, if you ever get the chance to have her as your waiter I promise you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
Food was extremely good and hot. Wait time wasn't too long, and the boils were delicious. Only complaint is they don't have enough refill drinks. Overall a solid 8/10

Amir our waiter demonstrated excellent customer service. His patience with orders and kindness during such is worthy of complimenting. May Hook & Reel continue providing their customers with such service excellence with their service providers food and environment. We thank you for Amir. üòä

I have been to so many restaurants in the past year. However, the service at Hook and reel has been nothing short of amazing. Amir was very attentive server with great attitude. His customer service made my experience an unforgettable moment. I will be a repeat customer because of the way I was treated. Thank you, Amir for the great customer service!
Letrice was amazing. She anticipated my needs for my order before I asked. Letrice was personable, friendly, and always approached us with a smile. She was awesome!
Letrice, was the best waitress ever. You have to go to this hook & Reels. Ask for her, she was such a beautiful person. I would recommend this place to anyone.
Letrice was amazing with stellar recommendations for an amazing evening with a lovely vibe. I had a great time and recommend she host more as she‚Äôs very hospitable and friendly.

I've always enjoyed Hook & Reel. I normally go to the one in my neighborhood in Long Island.

I was in the Bronx with my siblings and my brother decided we come here for drinks. We didn't eat anything but the drinks and bartender service were on point! Great customer service. They even would bud into our conversations lol. I hope i get those 2 (male and female Mothers Day) again the next time I go.

Hook and Reel is the spot. They have a variety of seafood options and great drinks. Can‚Äôt go wrong. Our waitress Jay was amazing. She was very attentive and friendly. She made sure we enjoyed ourselves and our time here. Will definitely be returning.
Good food and great for happy hour! Amir did his thing with taking order fast and consistently checking in and making sure we were well attended! Thanks Amir!
